entry.value: import pandas as pd%%00010import numpy as np%%00010%%00010sd_ngas=pd.DataFrame()%%00010sd_ngas=input_table%%00010%%00010calc_vstep0=pd.DataFrame()%%00010%%00010calc_vstep0.loc[:,'Country']=sd_ngas.loc[:,'Country']%%00010calc_vstep0['Years']=sd_ngas['Years']%%00010%%00010# Production%%00010calc_vstep0['st0_supply_fossil_coal[TWh]']=-1*sd_ngas['Fossil_coal_reduce[TWh]']%%00010calc_vstep0['st0_supply_fossil_gas[TWh]']=sd_ngas['Nat_gas_prod_inc[TWh]']%%00010%%00010%%00010# Nominal capacity nat_gas%%00010calc_vstep0['st0_cap_fossil_gas[GW]']=sd_ngas['Nat_gas_gross_sum_invest_power[GW]']%%00010%%00010# New capacity nat_gas%%00010calc_vstep0['st0_new_inv_nat[GW]']=sd_ngas['Nat_gas_gross_invest_power[GW]']%%00010%%00010# Fuel_consumption%%00010#Coal%%00010calc_vstep0['st0_fuel_fossil_coal[TWh]']=sd_ngas['coal_fuel_consumption_decr[TWh]']%%00010#Nat_gas%%00010calc_vstep0['st0_fuel_fossil_gas[TWh]']=sd_ngas['Nat_gas_fuel_consumption_old[TWh]']+\%%00010sd_ngas['Nat_gas_fuel_consumption_new[TWh]']%%00010%%00010# Emission nat gas%%00010calc_vstep0['st0_CO2e_fossil_gas[Gt]']=sd_ngas['Nat_gas_CO2_emission_old[kt]']+\%%00010sd_ngas['Nat_gas_CO2_emission_new[kt]']%%00010%%00010calc_vstep0['st0_CO2e_fossil_gas[Gt]']=\%%00010calc_vstep0['st0_CO2e_fossil_gas[Gt]'].divide(1000000)%%00010%%00010%%00010# Emission coal reduce%%00010calc_vstep0['st0_CO2e_fossil_coal[Gt]']=sd_ngas['Coal_CO2_emission_decr[kt]']%%00010# unit calc (Gt)%%00010calc_vstep0['st0_CO2e_fossil_coal[Gt]']=\%%00010calc_vstep0['st0_CO2e_fossil_coal[Gt]'].divide(1000000)%%00010%%00010%%00010output_table = calc_vstep0%%00010%%00010%%00010
